achievements.title: What Exactly Did I Just Watch?
achievements.desc: You discovered a whole new world of weird. Keep on watching.

achievements.title: My Mind Is Full of Fu**
achievements.desc: Your attempt to wrap your mind around this failed completely.

achievements.title: Is This the Real Life?
achievements.desc: It has become hard to distinguish between reality and fiction.

achievements.title: 「 Ｗｉｒｅｄ Ｓｏｕｎｄ 」
achievements.desc: You've seen too much. You've transcended humanity and operate on another level now.
